ygData.subject: RE: [The EverQuest Tavern] Everquest and Star Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: I really don t care for Star Wars. Though I have several of my guild that have disappeared too. My alternate game is Dark Age of Camelot. I have been known to
ygData.messageBody:
I really don't care for Star Wars. Though I have several of my guild that have disappeared too.

My alternate game is Dark Age of Camelot. I have been known to play DAOC for a couple weeks straight & then go back to EQ & play for a bit.

Guess I'm stuck in a D&D rut. LOL


Sue

Just me
No cute, sappy quotes
No wise words of wisdom
